short_summary: Request for Proposal (RFP) for the acquisition of pallet racks
description: Department of National Defence is issuing this Request for Proposal (RFP) for the acquisition of pallet racks [...]
duration_in_months: The contract will run from November 2022 to October 2024. The contract is expected to begin November 30, 2022, and it is expected to last 2 years.
tags: Industrial cabinets or drawers or shelving
